value.title: Is Azure Free Account really free? | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to use Microsoft Azure for free, for 12 months.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: http://azure.com/free
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0KEfaUfolVs" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in customer service
value.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise customer service to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in sales
value.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise sales organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Improve the developer experience of an API with Swagger documentation
value.excerpt: Learn how to document an existing API, written in C#/ASP.NET Core, using Swashbuckle, Swagger/OpenAPI, and Swagger UI.

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to Node.js
value.excerpt: Learn about Node.js: what it is, how it works, and when to use it.

value.title: Introduction to GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

value.title: Create and deploy Logic Apps using Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Define a Logic Apps workflow declaratively as a Resource Manager template and deploy the app using the Azure Command Line Interface (CLI).

value.title: Call an API from a Logic Apps workflow using a custom connector
value.excerpt: In this module, learn to create a Logic Apps custom connector to call an API from a Logic Apps workflow.

value.title: Query relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Query relational data in Azure

value.title: Translate text and speech
value.excerpt: Automated translation capabilities in an AI solution enables closer collaboration by removing language barriers.

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device
Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
topItems.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Analyze receipts with the Form Recognizer service
value.excerpt: Processing invoices and receipts is a common task in many business scenarios. Increasingly, organizations are turning to artificial intelligence (AI) to automate data extraction from scanned receipts.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Capture and view page load times in your Azure web app with Application Insights
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll configure Application Insights and use it to study page load data for an Azure web app.

value.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create a Content Delivery Network for your Website with Azure CDN and Blob Services
value.excerpt: This module looks at how to create and utilize a Content Delivery Network (CDN) within Azure to host commonly used assets, such as images in a website. The module covers Azure CDN rather than third-party integrations, and deals with using Blob Storage as an underlying storage model for stable or non-volatile data.

value.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Deploy a prebuilt module to the Edge device
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.excerpt: Describe Azure Databricks

value.excerpt: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365

value.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
value.excerpt: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification
value.excerpt: Use machine learning models to categorize data. Build a logistic regression model and support vector machine models to predict categories like win/loss and tree species.

images.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification

value.title: Predict numeric values with regression
value.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

value.title: Learn the data science method
value.excerpt: Learn about the history and motivation behind data science

value.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.
